title: Whereas by the antient laws and statutes of this realm, great and heady penalties are inflicted upon all such as shall be found to be spreaders of false news, or promoters of any malicious slanders and calumnies in their ordinary and common discourses ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Jo. Berkeley.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1670-1672 : Berkeley)
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,
